pages.title: Jaramel Trifle
pages.text: Sweet delicacies, guaranteed to not only give you a sugar rush - depending on the toppings very intense, mostly $(thing)offensive$() ones. Made from $(l:resources/jade_vines#jaramel)Jaramel$(/l), $(thing)Milk$() & $(l:resources/amaranth)Amaranth$(/l). Even the rudimentary one tastes great! The only thing that would make it more delicious would be the tears of your enemies.
Gives out effects at random. Fancy a gamble?

Chance to put you into $(thing)'Frenzy'$(): damage, attack speed, knockback resistance are buffed the more you kill. But if you do not score a kill in 20 seconds you get negative effects. Stacking $(thing)Frenzy$() increases it's potency instead.
